name: Commune with Spirits
range: Self, or others by ritual; 200ft (61m) distance
description: Enables the caster to see and speak with spirits, poltergeists, trapped entities and similar beings for information or dialogue.

name: Hallucination
duration: 3 minutes (12 melees) per level of experience
description: Implant a vivid, personalized illusion or delusion in a single target's mind; only the victim experiences the hallucination.

name: Locate
description: Sense the general location of a person or object previously encountered or depicted (photo/object); returns a general area rather than precise coordinates.

name: Exorcism
duration: 3 minutes (results can persist up to 6 months or longer)
saving_throw: Standard (12 by spell or 16 by ritual)
description: Force a possessing supernatural intelligence to relinquish control of a host; ritual versions improve chances of success.
effects: Provides bonuses vs possession for targets

name: Eyes of the Wolf
description: Grants exceptional nocturnal senses: nightvision (60ft), improved smell, tracking and a strong prowling ability; includes bonuses to perception-related checks.

name: Luck Curse
description: Inflicts a powerful curse of bad luck: removes bonuses to strike, parry, dodge, initiative and related mechanics; criticals and other effects are penalized.
